frontend.name: Frontend
frontend.description: I create clean, responsive, and user-friendly interfaces, meticulously turning designs into pixel-perfect, interactive web applications. My focus is on delivering seamless user experiences.

backend.name: Backend
backend.description: My expertise lies in building robust, scalable, and secure server-side applications and APIs. I focus on creating the logical foundation of a product and optimizing its performance, ensuring seamless data flow and reliable system functionality.
